dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: 닭 쫓던 개 지붕 쳐다본다이/가 뭐예요?
dialogue.romanization: dak jjotdeon gae jibung chyeodabondai/ga mwoyeyo?
dialogue.translation: What is "닭 쫓던 개 지붕 쳐다본다"?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 닭 쫓던 개 지붕 쳐다본다은/는 be left empty-handed(이)에요.
dialogue.romanization: dak jjotdeon gae jibung chyeodabondaeun/neun be left empty-handed(i)eyo.
dialogue.translation: "닭 쫓던 개 지붕 쳐다본다" means "be left empty-handed".
